General.Name: Mildex Optical
General.Description: Mildex Optical Inc. develops, manufactures, and sells military laptop, tablet PC, GPS, military/industrial/medical computers, kiosks, POS, and various other electronic devices in Taiwan. It offers large size touch screens for patient check-in Kiosk, diagnostic apparatus, industrial panel PC, and automation equipment; and traditional resistive touch screens for use in patient check-in Kiosk, diagnostic apparatus, industrial panel PC, automation equipment, smart monitoring system, IOT applications, imaging display system, ventilator/respirator, robotic surgery arm, patient monitoring system, fighter jets command system, handheld controller, rugged laptop, military vehicle/tank, treadmill, smart monitoring system, smart electronic, and self-service Kiosk applications. The company also provides resistive touch windows for patient check-in Kiosk, automation equipment, and smart monitoring system applications; and projective capacitive touch screens for patient check-in Kiosk, diagnostic apparatus, industrial panel PC, marine touch solution, backseat entertainment, central consoles, and public transportation HMI applications. In addition, it offers resistive multi-touch screens and sunlight readable touch screens for use in smart monitoring system, IOT applications, imaging display system, ventilator/respirator, treadmill, smart monitoring system, smart electronic, and self-service Kiosk applications; and touch display modules. The company was incorporated in 2005 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
